name: Omnimancer
storyline: In a world ruled by those who possess greater magical power and can perform the strongest spells, a girl aspires to rise in the ranks of wizards despite her limited magic abilities. Play as the witch Ophelia in this adventure, using the four elements of nature to defeat powerful enemies and create a new legend. In Omnimancer, you must explore the Tomb of Hecate to gain items and increasingly powerful abilities. Become more skilled with each match, and master each of the 4 elements to help Ophelia on her journey.
summary: Roguelite-style game in which you must explore an ancient tomb filled with dangers and practically infinite magic
